title: Zhonya, Welder of Time [Re-Created]
body:
**Zhonya, Welder of Time.**

**Health:** 589 - 1949
**Health Regen:** 6.5 - 17.9
**Mana:** 334 - 1184
**Mana Regen:** 6.0 - 19.6
**Range:** 550
**Attack Damage:** 53 - 104
**Attack Speed:** .635 (+28%)
**Armour:** 20.9 - 80.4
**Magic Resist:** 30
**Movement Speed:** 335

**Passive:** Zhonya's Curse
Whenever Zhonya attacks or cast a spell on an enemy unit, they gain a stack of Zhonya's Curse. Enemies with three or more stacks that are hit by Zhonya's abilities are stunned and all stacks are removed from them, enemies with more stacks are stunned for longer with a maximum of 9 stacks.

>For every 3 stacks, the enemy is stunned for .5 seconds, enemies can only be stunned once every 9 / 8 / 7 seconds starting at level 1 and automatically leveling up at level 6 and 11.

Enemies that cannot be stunned by Zhonya's Curse deal 4 / 7 / 10% less damage towards Zhonya. 

**Q:** Time Fragmentation
Zhonya sends a fragile fragment of time towards a target, dealing damage but leaving them unaffected, the fragment then breaks increasing by half it's traveled range, the last enemy champion (or unit if no champions) gains 1 stack for each unit hit. All units hit other than the first unit is slowed.

>Range: 1000 (1500)
Damage: 85 / 120 / 155 / 190 / 225 + .75% of AP (to first unit) 75 / 125 / 175 / 225 / 275+ .60% of AP (to all other units)
Slow: 35% for 1.5 / 1.75 / 2 / 2.25 / 2.5
Mana Cost: 65
Cooldown: 7 / 6.25 / 5.5 / 4.75 / 4


**W:** Ending Age
Passive:
Whenever a nearby non-large minion dies, Zhonya is healed for a % of their health and the minion has a chance of granting her a time fragment.
She also passively gains 1 time fragment every 10 seconds, if she has not gotten any in the past minute.

>Heal %: 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4% of its maximum health
Chance: 50 / 55 / 60 / 65 / 70%
Max Fragments: 10

Active:
Zhonya gathers all of the time fragments around her, sending it out in front of her in a cone of blue energy causing each enemy hit to have 2 additional stacks of Zhonya's Curse and be rooted in place.

>Range: 900
Cone: 45°
Root: .85 / 1 / 1.15 / 1.3 / 1.45
Damage: 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 + 7 per stack + .65% of AP
Mana Cost: 60 / 65 / 70 / 75 / 80
Cooldown: 7


**E:** Imbalance
Zhonya feels an imbalance between space and time, a wave of energy erupts from her body, causing nearby enemies to take damage and afterwards she starts to emit a light from her body causing nearby allies to be sped up and enemy champions to be slowed down.

>Damage Radius: 900
Speed / Slow Radius: 600
Damage: 40 / 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 + 70% of AP
Movement Speed: 7 / 9 / 11 / 13 / 15% (Zhonya gains double this)
Slow: 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15%
Duration: 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4 seconds
Mana Cost: 45 / 55 / 65 / 75 / 85
Cooldown: 13 / 12.25 / 11.50 / 10.75 / 10


**R:** Zhonya's Ring
Zhonya channels for a few seconds, sending out a blue mist around her. After she finishes, a blast explodes from the targets body causing everyone around them and themselves to take damage and the target becomes statis for a few seconds.

>Range: 1200
Radius: 650
Channel Duration: 2 / 1.5 / 1
Statis Duration: 2 / 2.5 / 3
Statis Reduction: .25 for each enemy champion that takes damage
Damage: 150 / 300 / 450 + .75% of AP
Mana Cost: 150
Cooldown: 130 / 105 / 80

Only spell shields block this. (Morgana's Black Shield counts.)


**Lore:**

During the time of the gods, the goddess of time Zhonya had gone berserk causing the heavens to tremble and power to pour. The Temple of Time  raged on and the world felt the imbalance, the heavens called help of an unknown man to stop her. {{champion:432}}  But he refused and flew off saying there was no immediate trouble.

While the heavens trembled the League of Legends were forming, in this time phase he felt the slow destruction of the fabric of time and space. He knew in order to stop her he must take her most precious item, her ring, Zhonya's Ring. While she slumbered due to rest after the use of so much magic, but while she slumbered she still emitted powerful energy creating a giant barrier that only he was able to pass through it and stole the ring while she slept. When she woke, the heavens cried for the last time before dying out.

----

Zhonya was devastated, with her powers gone she was removed from her kingdom and was sent down to Earth as punishment, she was no longer in control of time or part of the gods.
She became bloodthirsty, vengeful but also regretted, wanting to take back what was hers she ventured out to find it, on her way she knew she needed something else in order to replace the precious ring and give her just enough magic on the way, she found a broken hourglass on her journey and decided it would fit her and enchanted it with her remaining powers of time.

Soon she settled and found herself in the League, she saw the power of the ring distributed  through the large screen, angry and mindless, because it was being used so often it had gone to a state only just stronger than the hourglass she had on hand. Without another second of thinking she used the remaining powers in the hourglass to freeze time and swap the two items, stealing the ring to take back what was truly hers. Not knowing that the power inside of the hourglass continued to regain its magic, she left it there almost like an exchange.

---

After she was allowed back into the heavens, she overheard two girls talking about the new person in the Field of Justice, she heard them saying that the being there, was the being that had stopped her rampage years ago. Now with her ring and new gained powers over the years, she froze her heart (gods have no use for it) to stop her emotions from getting the way and she's thirsty for revenge.
